Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3822 Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3822 Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch FEATURES 14k rose gold-plated brass 47mm hunter case with a matching curb chain Skeleton dial with roman numerals 17 jewel mechanical movement Deluxe gift box DESCRIPTION He'll feel like a king when you present him with this fabulous traditional style pocket watch with Roman numeral dial. Brightly polished two-tone case is accented with brilliant rose gold-plated coat of arms and turret accents. Comes beautifully gift boxed with matching curb chain. Matching curb chain. Hunter case. Skeleton dial. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k rose gold plated. 1.89 in. Dia. Featuring an intricate engraved floral design on one side of its cover and a two-tone gold-plated shied design on the other, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch 3822 delights with its exquisite mix of old-world charm and sleek construction. Fourteen karat rose gold-plated brass gives this timepiece a rich look, while a skeleton dial features rose-gold in-lay, and a clean white outer ring with Roman numeral hour markers and three black-tone hands. Reliable and precise thanks to 17-jewel mechanical movement, this engravable watch arrives in a deluxe blue gift-box with matching curb chain.
